verses.text: \w At|strong="H0413"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* Merodach \w Baladan|strong="H1081"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Baladan|strong="H1081"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w letters|strong="H5612"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w presents|strong="H4503"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Ezechias: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w been|strong="H2388"\w* \w sick|strong="H2470"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w recovered|strong="H2388"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1004"\w* Ezechias \w rejoiced|strong="H8055"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* coming, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* shewed \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w storehouses|strong="H0214"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* aromatical \w spices|strong="H1314"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sweet|strong="H1314"\w* odours, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* precious \w ointment|strong="H8081"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w storehouses|strong="H0214"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w furniture|strong="H3627"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w treasures|strong="H0214"\w*. \w There|strong="H1961"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w dominion|strong="H4475"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* Ezechias shewed \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0935"\w* Isaias \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* Ezechias, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w from|strong="H0935"\w* whence \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H0376"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thee? \w And|strong="H0935"\w* Ezechias \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w From|strong="H0935"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* \w far|strong="H7350"\w* \w country|strong="H0776"\w* \w they|strong="H0376"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1004"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* thy \w house|strong="H1004"\w*? \w And|strong="H1004"\w* Ezechias \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w*, \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* shewn \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w treasures|strong="H0214"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* Isaias \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Ezechias: Rear \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* thy \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* thy \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w laid|strong="H0686"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w store|strong="H0686"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w carried|strong="H5375"\w* \w away|strong="H5375"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*: \w there|strong="H2009"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w left|strong="H3498"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w issue|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* thee, \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* thou shalt \w beget|strong="H3205"\w*, \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w away|strong="H3947"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w eunuchs|strong="H5631"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w palace|strong="H1964"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* Ezechias \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Isaias: \w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*, \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Only|strong="H7965"\w* \w let|strong="H1961"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w truth|strong="H0571"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.
